titleStmt.title: Guildhald. Civit. Exon. Ad general. Session. Pacis tent. apud Guildhaldam civitat. prædict. in & pro civitat. & com. civitat. Exon, decimo sexto die Aprilis, anno regni dom. nostri Caroli secundi dei gratia Angliæ, Scotiæ, Franciæ & Hiberniæ, regis, fidei defensor. &c. tricessimo quinto, annoque Dom. 1683.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Quarter Sessions of the Peace (Guildhall)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for George May book-seller in Exon,

notesStmt.note: 'Guildhald ... Exon.' are inclosed by a right curly bracket.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
